meta_info.name: DV_DATE
meta_info.description: Represents an absolute point in time, as measured on the Gregorian calendar, and specified only to the day. Semantics defined by ISO 8601. Used for recording dates in real world time. The partial form is used for approximate birth dates, dates of death, etc.

functions.name: magnitude
functions.meaning: Numeric value of the date as days since the calendar origin date `0001-01-01`.

functions.name: is_equal
functions.meaning: Return True if this `DV_QUANTIFIED` is considered equal to `_other_`.

functions.name: add
functions.meaning: Addition of a Duration to this Date.

functions.name: subtract
functions.meaning: Subtract a Duration from this Date.

functions.name: less_than
functions.meaning: True if this date object is less than `_other_`, based on comparison of `_magnitude()_`.
